reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Contributo allo OIM per la stabilizzazione delle comunità ad alto rischio della Sub prefettura di Ndele ed aree limitrofe (RCA)

description.narrative: Contribuire alla promozione della stabilità e della pace nella sub prefettura di Ndélé.

The project aims to support the fragile peace process in the Central African Republic (CAR) with immediate action in Ndélé and surrounding villages, in order to a) maintain the momentum of community stabilization and strengthen local peace building capacities, b) decrease the risk for recruitment and manipulation of youth by armed groups and c) create conditions that facilitate the reintegration of returning populations into the social community fabric.

tag.narrative: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value
By 2030, eradicate extreme poverty for all people everywhere, currently measured as people living on less than $1.25 a day
End poverty in all its forms everywhere
Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
